Class ReflectiveInterceptionProxier

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.proxy.AbstractProxier<InterceptionProxier.Specification>
org.microbean.proxy.AbstractReflectiveProxier<InterceptionProxier.Specification>
org.microbean.producer.ReflectiveInterceptionProxier
public final class ReflectiveInterceptionProxier extends AbstractReflectiveProxier<InterceptionProxier.Specification>
An AbstractReflectiveProxier implementation that uses the proxy features of the Java Development Kit.
Author:
Laird Nelson
